plot: A 'mockumentary' about the making of a science fiction film that is shot entirely on blue-screen. The action takes place on and off the set and follows the cast and crew and their flawed project.
title: Making Juice: The Making of Juice
plot_es: A 'mockumentary' about the making of a science fiction film that is shot entirely on blue-screen. The action takes place on and off the set and follows the cast and crew and their flawed project.
original_name: Making Juice: The Making of Juice
plot_en: A 'mockumentary' about the making of a science fiction film that is shot entirely on blue-screen. The action takes place on and off the set and follows the cast and crew and their flawed project.
